overview: "The Horseman Story" is a feature documentary directed and produced by Ksenia Giorno, telling the life story of a famous Emirati Horse master Tariq Al Muhairi by following him in the latest shows in Abu Dhabi and Dubai. The film was shot at the time of the 42nd National Day, when the equestrian team of Tariq Al Muhairi was performing at the official cultural events.
title: The Horseman Story
